title: Compare Vaccines - Treato
paragraphs: Posts are moderated, please avoid commercial content and spam.
Thank you for sharing your experience!
I rushed her to the vets on the 30th May as she was not drinking and was lethargic.
On the 1st June she was losing her balance and they suspected a brain disorder.
They then decided to test for Addisons, on the 2nd June she was diagnosed.
My doctor recommended that I be given Prevnar13 vaccine and flu shot.
I was given both on February 5 2016.
Within a week I developed tinnitus.
I went to see my doctor and she said most likely its caused from hearing loss cause of my age.
I believe it is related to the vaccines.
There is far more mercury in seafood than vaccines.

small-12"> <div class="post-content"> <span class="snippet-text">My little dog was a rescue from Cyprus, she had all the vaccines.. I had her boosters done the day they were due which was 27th April, on 29th May she showed real signs of being unwell.. I rushed her to the vets on the 30th May as she was not drinking and was lethargic. On the 1st June she was losing her balance and they suspected a brain disorder. They then decided to test for Addisons, on the 2nd June she was diagnosed. I did suspect the vaccines, but thought the period of time was too long..
